name: WGJ06 - Red Light Green Light
description:
This is my first game jam attempt: Weekly Game Jam 6.  Maybe a few hours too late.

The object of the game is to get as many balls in the bucket before the time runs out. 

Use the red light to make a ball stop!
Use the green light to make a ball go!

[Space]/Mouse Click] Change Flashlight Color
[Mouse] Move Flashlight
